title: Building user interfaces interactively using pre- and postconditions
proctitle: CHI '92: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems
abstract: A tool is presented which allows graphic layout of a user interface integrated with specification of behavior using pre- and postconditions.

references.text: Foley, J., W. Kim, S. Kovacevic, and K. Murray, "Defining Interfaces at a High Level of Abstraction", IEEE Software, (6)I, January 1989, pp. 25-32.
Gieskens, D., and J. Foley, "Controlling User Interface Objects Through Pre- and Postconditions" in Proceedings of CHI'92, Monterey, CA, May 1992.
Sun Microsystems, Inc., "Open Windows Developer's Guide 1.I, Reference Manual", Part No. 800-5380-10, Revision A, of June 1990.
